text: Bernburg Hauptbahnhof is a railway station in the municipality of Bernburg, located in the Salzlandkreis district in Saxony-Anhalt, Germany. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Saxony-Anhalt Category:Buildings and structures in Salzlandkreis Category:Railway stations in Germany opened in 1846 Category:1846 establishments in Prussia
title: Bernburg Hauptbahnhof
